name: Hungry Cats 饥饿的猫
description:
Welcome to Hungry Cats

This is a relaxing puzzle game where each level has hungry cats that need to be fed. You need to manually draw lines to guide food to the cats, and since each cat has its own appetite and taste preferences, careful calculation is required to satisfy them.

----- Game Features ------

- Hand-drawn style scenes and cats.
- 60 carefully crafted levels.
- Simple controls for puzzle solving.
- Relaxing music and sound effects.
